column4: -- ============================================= -- Author:		Jean-Pierre Poulin -- Create date: 2012-11-27 -- Description: Trigger pour updater COB_CacheObjects -- ============================================= create TRIGGER [dbo].[CLI_Clients_Trigger]    ON  [dbo].[CLI_Clients]    AFTER INSERT AS  BEGIN 	SET NOCOUNT ON;  	declare @clientId as uniqueidentifier 	declare @table table (CLI_cID uniqueidentifier)  	insert into @table (CLI_cID) select distinct(CLI_cID) from deleted union select distinct(CLI_cID) from inserted  	while ((select count(*) from @table) > 0) 	begin 		select top 1 @clientId = CLI_cID from @table  		INSERT INTO [dbo].[FST_FormSyncTasks] ([FST_dtCreated], [FST_cAction], [CLI_cID]) 		VALUES (getdate(), 'Update', @clientId)  		delete from @table where CLI_cID = @clientId 	end  END

-- ============================================= -- Author:		Jean-Pierre Poulin -- Create date: 2012-11-27 -- Description: Trigger pour updater COB_CacheObjects -- ============================================= create TRIGGER [dbo].[FDV_FormDefinitions_Trigger]    ON  [dbo].[FDV_FormDefinitionVersions]    AFTER INSERT,DELETE,UPDATE AS  BEGIN 	SET NOCOUNT ON;  	declare @id as uniqueidentifier 	declare @table table (id uniqueidentifier)  	insert into @table (id) select distinct(FDV_cID) from deleted union select distinct(FDV_cID) from inserted  	while ((select count(*) from @table) > 0) 	begin 		select top 1 @id = id from @table  		INSERT INTO [dbo].[FST_FormSyncTasks] ([FST_dtCreated], [FST_cAction], [FDV_cID]) 		VALUES (getdate(), 'Update', @id)  		delete from @table where id = @id 	end  END

-- ============================================= -- Author:		Jean-Pierre Poulin -- Create date: 2012-11-27 -- Description: Trigger pour updater COB_CacheObjects -- ============================================= create TRIGGER [dbo].[FOD_FormDefinitions_Trigger]    ON  [dbo].[FOD_FormDefinitions]    AFTER INSERT,DELETE,UPDATE AS  BEGIN 	SET NOCOUNT ON;  	declare @id as uniqueidentifier 	declare @table table (id uniqueidentifier)  	insert into @table (id) select distinct(FOD_cID) from deleted union select distinct(FOD_cID) from inserted  	while ((select count(*) from @table) > 0) 	begin 		select top 1 @id = id from @table  		INSERT INTO [dbo].[FST_FormSyncTasks] ([FST_dtCreated], [FST_cAction], [FOD_cID]) 		VALUES (getdate(), 'Update', @id)  		delete from @table where id = @id 	end  END
